trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Charleston
There were no other sightings in Charleston on or around June 9th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my car at MMTC, a local college here, facing south. I had just purchased a video camera and was trying it out. I was filming towards the East. I only recorded about 2 min. of video. It was a clear sky. No wind at all. I didn't notice the object while I was filming. When I got home I downloaded the video and previewed it on Windows Media Player. At around time stamp 1:42 I noticed an object, at the left bottom part of the film, right above the tree line, fly by really fast. Slowed it down and noticed it was a large object. Even in slow motion it traveled really fast on the video.I then tried to capture frame shots of it, still had a hard time because of the speed of the object, but I managed to get a couple. I enhanced them the best I could but... Below are the pics and video of the object. I don't know if it was a "UFO", but it traveled very fast and I know of no craft that we have that does that. Please view and let me know what you think. Thanks. "Keeping My Eyes To The Sky"
